title: SciFi Destroyer Xander: Powerful Mechanoid Trooper
description: SciFi Destroyer Xander is powerful mechanoid trooper character model. Created with the very best of highpoly sculpt retopologization workflow, this model features full PBR textures and customizable color schemes.
longDescription:
Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


SciFi Destroyer Xander is powerful mechanoid trooper character model. Created with the very best of high-poly sculpt retopologization workflow, this model features full PBR textures and customizable color schemes. The texture set is 8192 by 8192 and the characters eyes feature a color shift lens effect.


[TAGS] Character, Robot, Cyborg, SciFi, Sci Fi, Sci-Fi, Cybernetic, Metal, Soldier


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  One character model
  •  8762 triangles
  •  Custom physics asset
  • 4963 vertices
  • Six textures
  • 8192x8192 texture size

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes [Actually rigged to Epic skeleton, no retargetting shenanigans. Just consolidate skeleton assets.]

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: 4963

Texture Resolutions: 8192x8192

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
